DOC.detailed_description: This observational study cover 30 provincials/municipals/autonomous mainland China except Hong Kong Macau . Tier 3 hospital , psychiatric hospital , elderly hospital , nurse home community randomly select research center , 2500 patient AD caregiver enrol last . The main outcome study assess electronic medical system community hospital , also questionnaires . Using societal prevalence-based gross COI approach estimate total yearly cost AD China .
